mapper.select: select sido_code as sidoCode, sido_name as sidoName from trip.sidos

select spot_id as spotId ,title as title ,content_type_id as contentTypeId ,sido_code as sidoCode ,sigungu_code as sigunguCode ,first_image1 as imagePath1 ,first_image2 as imagePath2 ,map_level as mapLevel ,latitude as latitude ,longitude as longitude ,addr1 as frontAddress ,addr2 as rearAddress from trip.spot where sigungu_code = #{sigunguCode}
select content_type_id as spotTypeId, content_type_name as spotTypeName from trip.contenttypes

select spot_id as spotId ,title as title ,content_type_id as contentTypeId ,sido_code as sidoCode ,sigungu_code as sigunguCode ,first_image1 as imagePath1 ,first_image2 as imagePath2 ,map_level as mapLevel ,latitude as latitude ,longitude as longitude ,addr1 as frontAddress ,addr2 as rearAddress from trip.spot where content_type_id = #{contentTypeId}

select spot_id as spotId ,title as title ,content_type_id as contentTypeId ,area_code as sidoCode ,si_gun_gu_code as sigunguCode ,first_image1 as imagePath1 ,first_image2 as imagePath2 ,map_level as mapLevel ,latitude as latitude ,longitude as longitude ,addr1 as frontAddress ,addr2 as rearAddress from trip.spot where spot_id = #{spotId}

SELECT DISTINCT s.spot_id AS spotId, s.title, s.content_type_id AS contentTypeId, s.area_code AS sidoCode, s.si_gun_gu_code AS sigunguCode, s.first_image1 AS imagePath1, s.first_image2 AS imagePath2, s.map_level AS mapLevel, s.latitude, s.longitude, s.addr1 AS frontAddress, s.addr2 AS rearAddress FROM trip.spot s WHERE s.spot_id IN ( SELECT r.spot_id FROM trip.review r JOIN trip.plan p ON r.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} )
